space_quota_warning:
[1;31m!!! Warning: Little storage space left in {path} [0;0m
    Your folder {path} is close to the quota.
    Check with `dusage` and see here for ways on how to solve it:
    https://documentation.sigma2.no/files_storage/quota.html
files_quota_warning:
[1;31m!!! Warning: Too many files in {path} [0;0m
    Your folder {path} is close to the number of files quota.
    Check with `dusage` and see here for ways on how to solve it:
    https://documentation.sigma2.no/files_storage/quota.html
